Sections.Text: The Bosch Estate, 1909. Trapped in the halls beneath the manse, Cornelius Bosch's final experiment lies in wait, locked behind mystic wards.
Elias Tyree has taken a risk breaking Bosch's wards when he finally entered the cellars. Now arcane rifts are opening throught the lab.
The Thing Bosch was creating can use the energy from these rifts to summon more spirits to its aid.
But if Tyree and his fellow intruders can reach a rift first, they can channel some of the energy into a powerful feedback burst, damaging The Thing.
Laurel Gale is a writer and investigator specializing in the supernatural, and can use both aid her allies and disrupt her foes, while protecting herself at close range with a rune-inscribed cudgel.
Shaun Westmacott has traveled the world collecting rare and dangerous antiquities, some of which he uses as weapons to keep the dark forces at bay.
